title: Christy Turlington, 55, and Lookalike Daughter Grace, 20, Showcase Stylish Genes in Playful Fashion Campaign | Flipboard
text: Christy Turlington, 55, and Lookalike Daughter Grace, 20, Showcase Stylish Genes in Playful Fashion Campaign Christy Turlington and Grace Burns are kickin’ it in style. The supermodel and maternal health advocate, 55, stars in a new Keds ad with her 20-year-old daughter — and it just might be her sweetest one yet!
